description: minikube - local Kubernetes cluster for development

common_errors.solution: Verify driver is installed and running, try different driver with --driver flag

common_errors.cause: System does not have enough memory for minikube
common_errors.solution: Reduce memory allocation with --memory flag, close other applications, increase system RAM

common_errors.cause: System does not have enough CPUs for minikube
common_errors.solution: Reduce CPU allocation with --cpus flag, default is 2
Start Docker Desktop or run 'systemctl start docker'

common_errors.cause: Minikube cluster is not running or was deleted
common_errors.solution: Start cluster with 'minikube start', check with 'minikube status'
Increase disk size with --disk-size, prune images with 'minikube ssh -- docker system prune'
Try different network plugin, reset with 'minikube delete' and restart
Check addon name with 'minikube addons list', verify cluster is healthy

common_errors.cause: Minikube tunnel for LoadBalancer services failed
common_errors.solution: Run 'minikube tunnel' with sudo, check for existing tunnel processes

common_errors.cause: Minikube profile does not exist or is corrupted
common_errors.solution: List profiles with 'minikube profile list', create with 'minikube start -p <name>'
